name: Laying Pipe
description:
Ready to lay some pipe?
Laying Pipe is a puzzler... with just 64*64 pixels. Pick the correct piece of pipe to connect the reservoir with the goal. But hurry up or the impatient plumber will just throw a random pipe at the wall.

Instructions

  • Select a field to place your pipe with your mouse.
  • Pick the right pipe with "1-6" on your keyboard.
    • (The pipes are in the same order as they are shown on screen. Every type of pipe has an indicator that shows you how many of that type you have left to complete the level.)
  • If you mess up you can always press "R" to restart the level.

In later levels you'll come across fields with rotation. Watch out: They will spin your pipe 90 degrees in the direction indicated.

Development
This was my first ever game jam as well as my first ever "completed" game... so I'm quite happy with the result.
